titleStmt.title: The resolvtion of His Excellence the Earle of Essex, lord generall of the forces, now raised for the defence of the King, Parliament, and kingdome together with the Parliament's resolution concerning the said Earl of Essex.
titleStmt.author: Essex, Robert Devereux, Earl of, 1591-1646.
Elsynge, Henry, 1598-1654.
England and Wales. Parliament.

notesStmt.note: Place of publication suggested by Wing (2nd ed.).
"Ordered that this be forthwith printed and published --Hen. Elsing. Cler. Parl, D, Com."
Reproduction of original in: Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
